programme.desc: Two men. Living on the exact opposite side of the world. When one sleeps, the other one is awake. But when they finally meet, a simple question arises: Who is the dream and who is the dreamer?

programme.title: The Beyond
programme.desc: Astronauts modified with advanced robotics are sent through a newly discovered wormhole. When the mission returns unexpectedly, the space agency races to discover what the astronauts encountered on their groundbreaking interstellar journey.

programme.title: Bravestorm
programme.desc: In the year 2050 mankind is extinct. The last survivors travel back in time to stop the invader, the Killgis, in a battle of giant robots.

programme.title: Bad Milo
programme.desc: A man learns that his unusual stomach pains are being caused by a demon living in his intestines.

programme.title: Los Hijos De La Noche aka Children of the Night
programme.desc: Un periodista visita un orfanato apartado y descubre que sus habitantes son vampiros infantiles con oscuros planes para la humanidad.

programme.title: Replace
programme.desc: Afflicted with a dermatological disease, young and beautiful Kira discovers that she can replace her skin with that of other girls. Helped by her lover, she plots a murder and the victim becomes her donor, but when the disease returns, she is forced to find more victims.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: Wraith
programme.desc: After living in an old mansion for almost 10 years a family suddenly discovers a ghost-like presence trying to communicate with them.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Declared a modern masterpiece by critics around the world, The Assassin stars Shu Qi as an acolyte of the deadly arts, sent on a mission of vengeance with her betrothed as the target.

programme.title: Brotherhood of Blades
programme.desc: Three sworn brothers, Secret Police of the Imperial Guard, are pawns in a deadly game, unleashing a chain of secrets, conspiracies, and lethal consequences.

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: Earth has been conquered by robots from a distant galaxy. Survivors are confined to their houses and must wear electronic implants, risking incineration by robot sentries if they venture outside.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Harmony is a super-empath, born with the power to absorb the fear of others. With a storm of negative energy encroaching, Harmony must find the strength to take hold of her power to save the man she loves and the world around them. The film is a supernatural story about the universal balance between the emotions of fear and love, starring Jessica Falkholt, Jerome Meyer, and Eamon Farren.

programme.title: Siren
programme.desc: Leigh has a unique power: every man who encounters her sees his ultimate fantasy, and falls uncontrollably in love with her.

programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County where he targets a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.
